# MH


### Binomial coefficient

The number of unordered samples of y objects selected from n objects without replacement is 

$$ {n \choose y} = \frac{n \times (n-1) \times (n-y-1)}{y!}) \\
 = \frac{[n \times (n-1) \times (n-y+1)](n-1)!}{(n-1)!y!} \\
 = \frac{n!}{(n-1)!y!}$$
